headline: FDA chief Marty Makary says 'everything should be over the counter' unless drug is unsafe or addictive
summary: Makary said the FDA is looking at prescription drugs like nausea medications and vaginal estrogen, and hopes to make changes this year.

raw.headline: FDA chief Marty Makary says 'everything should be over the counter' unless drug is unsafe or addictive
